T02TD3413E:80a-1: shr'i kharsa p'a na s'a dha nam /
T02TD3413E:80a-3: dpal ldan mkha' spyod kyi sgrub thabs /
T02TD3413E:80a-4: dpal ldan mkha' spyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3413E:80b-0: @80b dang por re zhig sngags pas stan bde ba la nye bar 'dug ste /
T02TD3413E:80b-1: rang gi snying gar pam yig yongs su gyur pa las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa /
T02TD3413E:80b-2: de'i steng du aa yig yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02TD3413E:80b-3: de'i steng du hr'i:yig las 'od zer bltas te /
T02TD3413E:80b-4: 'od zer des 'og min gyi sa la zhugs te ;
T02TD3413E:80b-5: 'jig rten dbang phyug gdan drangs nas mdun gyi nam mkha'i mthil du bltas te sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD3413E:80b-6: 'di lta ste sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02TD3413E:80b-7: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02TD3413E:80b-8: bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba dang /
T02TD3413E:80b-9: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T02TD3413E:80b-12: byang chub tu sems bskyed par byas nas /
T02TD3413E:80b-13: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD3413E:80b-18: de nas stong pa nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD3413E:80b-19: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes pas rang gi lus gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar bltas la /
T02TD3413E:80b-20: snying ga'i dbus su pam yig las skyes pa'i padma 'dab ma brgyad pa /
T02TD3413E:80b-21: de'i steng du aa yig las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du hr'i:yig dmar po'i 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bkug cing bcug nas bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs su bsgom par bya ste /
T02TD3413E:80b-22: sku mdog dkar po ral pa'i cod pan can /
T02TD3413E:80b-24: cig shos na padma dkar po bsnams pa /
T02TD3413E:80b-25: skyil krung phyed pas bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
T02TD3413E:80b-26: 'od dpag tu med pa'i cod pan can /
T02TD3413E:80b-27: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa /
T02TD3413E:80b-28: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus spras pa /
T02TD3413E:80b-29: zla ba'i gdan la zla ba'i 'od lta bu'i bdag nyid rnam par bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD3413E:80b-30: de'i g-yas su 'phags ma sgrol ma dang nor bzangs /
T02TD3413E:80b-31: g-yon du khro gnyer can dang rta mgrin /
T02TD3413E:80b-32: shar du rnam par snang mdzad /
T02TD3413E:80b-35: byang du don yod grub pa rnams so //
T02TD3413E:80b-37: bden bral du m'a ma k'i /
T02TD3413E:80b-39: dbang ldan du rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma rnams so //
T02TD3413E:80b-40: de nas snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis ye shes sems dpa' dgug cing rab tu gzhug par bya'o //
T02TD3413E:81a-0: mig la sogs pa byin gyis @81a * //
T02TD3413E:81a-2: lus dang ngag dang yid byin gyis brlabs nas dbang bskur ba zhu bar bya'o //
T02TD3413E:81a-3: ji ltar 'khrungs tsam nyid nas ni //
T02TD3413E:81a-4: de bzhin gshegs rnams khrus gsol ba //
T02TD3413E:81a-5: lha yi chu bo dag pa yis //
T02TD3413E:81a-6: de bzhin bdag kyang khrus mdzad gsol //
T02TD3413E:81a-7: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka ta sa ma ya shri ye h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD3413E:81a-8: spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bcu yang dag par spros nas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te /
T02TD3413E:81a-12: dpal ldan mkha' spyod kyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
